snippet.title: The Far Rings Game Trailer - A Space Opera Visual Novella
snippet.description:
RELEASING ON OCT 5, 2019 for Windows, Mac, & Linux! A SHORT and FREE game about discovering dark truths and deciding where Home truly lies for our protagonist, Doctor Athena. WISHLIST on STEAM here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1100270/The_Far_Rings_A_Space_Opera_Visual_Novella/?beta=0

Check out our website! 
https://www.thefarrings.com/

Check out the game jam demo that started it all!
https://heiden.itch.io/the-far-rings

Awesome voicework contributed by: Liam (Broadcaster), Rochelle J Chiang (Athena), Reece Bridger (Captain Odysseus), Robyn McConnell (Chiron), Lochingbird (alien voices)
